    • viewByWeekSelected

      public void viewByWeekSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Queries the database with a query to only show appointments within the week. Sets items in the tableView based on what the query returns
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - view by week radio button selected
      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the query

      Throws:
      SQLException - if error occurs during the query

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the screen and populates the tableviews appointment and customer respectively
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - resourceBundle The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
